Html:
Hello Mark and PHPExcel community, I've enjoyed using PHPExcel thus far to read in and iterate through .csv and Excel files. (I use only a few of the functions of PHPExcel, but they are incredibly valuable)

That being said, while looking at, say, PHPExcel_1.8.0_doc\Examples\07reader.php, and other example files, I began to realize there is a big license blurb at the top.
So question: do i need to copy that blurb into the section of my code that uses PHPExcel? It's quite chunky
No, you're not legally obliged to copy that license blurb in your own code at all; nor is there any technical need to do so

Thanks Mark for the quick reply. Works for me. Take care
Psalm 130:3-4
